heading: Programming
paragraphOne: A complex rewind / replay system. Using compact inherited classes to track the and store specific variables every frame.
paragraphTwo: An elegant audio-crossfading script, that allows for the music to be seamless throughout, perfectly fading in and out.

heading: GAMEPLAY
paragraphOne: Fast paced, addictive gameplay that offers the player a tough but addictive challenge in each of the game's 30 levels.
paragraphTwo: An illustrated, worldess story, told from different perspectives. A unique way to approach narrative in an indie game.

heading: DESIGN AND ANIMATION
paragraphOne: A minimalist art style, designed and painted from scratch, to look unlike any other indie game on the market.
paragraphTwo: Traditional frame-by-frame animations, that mesh perfectly with Sprinter's hand-drawn visual aesthetic.

heading: AUDIO COMPOSITION
paragraphOne: A layered original soundtrack, that builds as the player progresses, reaching a crescendo at the end of each chapter.
paragraphTwo: In-game sound effects that create a stunning melody which blends in perfectly with the soundtrack.
